newsitem.title: USA: Excel Corp Ottumwa, Iowa, pork plant shut by fire.
newsitem.headline: Excel Corp Ottumwa, Iowa, pork plant shut by fire.

text.p: The Excel Corp pork plant at Ottumwa, Iowa, was closed Monday after a fire broke out there about 1930 CST/0130 GMT Sunday, fire deparment and hog industry officials said.
Fire crews continued to battle the fire early Monday. No deaths or injuries had been reported, said an Ottumwa Fire Department spokesman.
The plant usually operates two shifts and processes 10,000 hogs a day, hog industry sources said. Hogs normally slaughtered at the plant will be shipped to an Excel Illinois plant, the sources said.
Excel is a unit of Cargill Inc. Cargill and Excel officials were not immediately available for comment.
